name: Talmar Anderson
who_you_serve: Talmar serves entrepreneurs and business owners looking to improve their hiring processes and team management.
what_you_do: Talmar Anderson provides consulting services focused on helping business owners build and scale effective teams, offering strategies for hiring and managing personnel to avoid burnout.
